sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
icps cpsmidi iamp ampmidi .5 ips midictrl 9, 10, 500 ;controller 9
kenv madsr 0.5, 0, 1, 0.5 asig pluck kenv, icps, ips, 2, 1 ;change tone color outs asig, asig
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 2 0 4096 10 1 ;sine wave ; no score events allowed f0 30 ;runs 30 seconds e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
